ControlLayer

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ControlLayer.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Switches between the main flows of the application. Acts as the "Maestro" in an orchestra, and there is only one single instance of it.

    • Field Summary

      private GameEngine _GameEngine 
      private SoundEngine _SoundEngine 
      private SwingUICore _UICore

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller()

    • Method Detail

      • ApplicationStartUp

        public void ApplicationStartUp()
        Display the Swing based UI, starting with the main menu when the program launches

      • UserInitiatesSideBySideGame

        public void UserInitiatesSideBySideGame()
        Navigate to the car selection screen and initiate a side-by-side player game. This method is called when user selects the side-by-side game on the main menu.

      • UserInitiatesSinglePlayerGame

        public void UserInitiatesSinglePlayerGame()
        Navigate to the car selection screen and initiate a single player game. This method is called when user selects the single player game on the main menu.

      • NavigateToCarSelectionWithDefaults

        private void NavigateToCarSelectionWithDefaults()
        Orders the top JFrame to load the LaunchScreen JPanel.

      • NavigatingBackToMainMenuScreen

        public void NavigatingBackToMainMenuScreen()
        Navigate to the main menu screen and resets the game session. This can be called when the user either clicks on the "new game" option on the MenuBar or when a game finishes and the player will be put back to the main menu.

      • ChangeGameSessionCar

        public void ChangeGameSessionCar(int PlayerNumber,
                                 int CarIndex)
        Changes the selected car for a player in a game session. This method is called from the LaunchScreen JPanel.
        Parameters:
        PlayerNumber - The number of the player to change the car for. Starts from 1.
        CarIndex - The index number of the selected car. Starts from 0.

      • ChangeGameSessionMap

        public void ChangeGameSessionMap(int MapNumber)
        Changes the selected map. This is called from the LaunchScreen JPanel.
        Parameters:
        MapNumber - The index number of the selected map. Starts from 0.

      • LaunchGame

        public void LaunchGame()
        Instantiates the GameEngine, which takes over the control to launch a new game. This is called from the LaunchScreen JPanel when user clicks on "start".

      • GameSettingsMenuBarMusicChanged

        public void GameSettingsMenuBarMusicChanged(boolean newState)
        Directs the SoundEngine to turn on/off the background music. This is called when user clicks on the relevant option on the MenuBar.
        Parameters:
        newState - True to turn on the music. False for turning it off.

      • GameSettingsMenuBarSoundChanged

        public void GameSettingsMenuBarSoundChanged(boolean newState)
        Directs the SoundEngine to turn on/off the in-game sounds. This is called when user clicks on the relevant option on the MenuBar.
        Parameters:
        newState - True to turn on the sounds. False for turning them off.

      • GameSettingsMenuBarMapTextureChanged

        public void GameSettingsMenuBarMapTextureChanged(boolean newState)
        Sets the in-game map texture on or off. If the texture is off, then border lines will be drawn out instead.
        Parameters:
        newState - True to keep the texture on. False for turning it off.

      • get_GameEngine

        public GameEngine get_GameEngine()
        Getter for the instantiated GameEngine.
        Returns:
        Returns the GameEngine instance.

      • UserInitiatesExit

        public void UserInitiatesExit()
        Shuts down the application. Called when user clicks on the "Exit" in the main menu.
